articles.author: Marcia Dunn
articles.title: Veteran Hubble vs. new Webb space telescope - CTV News
articles.description: With NASA and the European Space Agency's Hubble pushing 32 years in orbit, the bigger, 100 times more powerful Webb is widely viewed as its successor even though the two are vastly different.
articles.content:
CAPE CANAVERAL, FLA. -- 
Don't ask astronomers to choose between the Hubble Space Telescope and the new kid on the cosmic block, the James Webb Space Telescope.
"Comparing Hubble and Webb is like a… [+5364 chars]

articles.title: Astronomers discover largest group of 'rogue planets' yet - The Verge

articles.content:
Several billion of these free-floating giants could exist

articles.title: The Somalayas are the biggest mountain range you will never see - Phys.org
